hero.description: Welcome to my portfolio! Here you can check out my projects, my social networks, and my contact information.

about.first_paragraph_content: I'm Nassinger, a {{age}}-year-old developer passionate about the world of programming. I believe technology should be used to improve people's lives. That's why I strive to create applications that are intuitive, accessible, and impactful. In this portfolio, you will find a selection of my projects, skills, and contact information.
about.second_paragraph_content: I have a total of {{codingYears}} years of experience in software development, with a focus on web technologies. I started my journey creating applications with [HTML](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/HTML), [CSS](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/CSS), [JavaScript](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Javascript), and [Node.js](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Node.js). Later, I learned [TypeScript](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/TypeScript), [React](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/React_\(software\)) and [Deno](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Deno_\(software\)). In addition, I have also worked with [Python](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Python_\(programming_language\)) and [Lua](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lua).

unoesc.title: Information Systems
unoesc.subtitle: Designing, developing, testing, and maintaining systems (2025)
unoesc.description: I am currently studying Information Systems at [Unoesc](https://www.unoesc.edu.br/campus/chapeco/), where I am further enhancing my software development skills. The course covers various areas, including systems analysis, databases, networks, and information security. I am learning to design, develop, test, and maintain software systems efficiently and effectively.

creative-coding.title: Creative Coding
creative-coding.subtitle: Using code as a form of creative expression (2023)
creative-coding.description: I took courses in [creative coding](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EoL5R_0h9xk), where I learned to use code as a tool to create visuals, graphics, and interactive experiences. I know how to develop generative visual pieces, exploring motion, interactivity, and real-time changes. I enjoy working with code in an experimental way, blending logic and creativity to build visual compositions.
